org.ldaptive.provider
Interface ProviderConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApacheLdapConnection, JLdapConnection, JLdapSSLConnection, JLdapStartTLSConnection, JndiConnection, JndiStartTLSConnection, NetscapeConnection, OpenDJConnection, OpenDSConnection, UnboundIDConnection
public interface ProviderConnection

Interface for a provider specific implementation of ldap operations.

Version:
$Revision: 2606 $ $Date: 2013-02-07 12:02:33 -0500 (Thu, 07 Feb 2013) $
Author:
Middleware Services
